nodes.text: A rescue worker was a witness to an incident during the Taris Siege in 3963 BBY in which a city surveillance droid attempted to issue a parking citation to a Mandalorian bomb, causing it to go off without injuring anyone. Afterward, the rescuer was interviewed by the Taris Holofeed, and although the worker gave them a quote to use in publication, the rescuer asked to remain anonymous.

The rescue worker appears in the in-universe news organ The Taris Holofeed: Siege Edition, which was written by John Jackson Miller and included in the fifteenth issue of the Knights of the Old Republic comic book series.
